name: tarball_app_builder
title: Tarball App Builder
summary: Builds an app from a tarball
description:
**This is a low-level app. Consider using "dx-build-app --remote" instead, which calls this app internally.**

Builds your app from a .tar.gz File object.

The App Builder does the following:

* Unpacks the input tarball
* Builds with `./configure` and `make && make install` (optional; only run if a `./configure` file and a makefile are found, respectively)
* Uploads the resulting applet to DNAnexus and creates an app

inputSpec.name: input_file
inputSpec.label: Input File
inputSpec.help: A .tar.gz file containing DNAnexus app source code

inputSpec.name: recurse
inputSpec.label: Recurse?
inputSpec.help: If true, runs dx-build-app from every subdirectory that has a dxapp.json file in it

inputSpec.name: publish
inputSpec.label: Publish?
inputSpec.help: If true, publishes the resulting app(s)

inputSpec.name: extra_flags
inputSpec.label: Extra flags for dx-build-app
inputSpec.help: Any extra flags to be added to the dx-build-app call
